scripts.postinstall: openapi-generator-cli generate -i openapi.yml -g spring -o ./server && openapi-generator-cli generate -i openapi.yml -g typescript-rxjs -o ./shared/src/generated/hello-world
scripts.server: cd server && docker build -t backend-server . && docker run -d -p 5000:8080 backend-server
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run shared" "npm run svelte" "npm run react" "npm run angular"
